name: Addichrone
description: Use to fight symptoms of withdrawal until a cure can be administered.

name: Alien Genetic Material
description: Can be consumed to greatly increase
effect: +500 Damage Resistance for 30s +500 Energy Resistance for 30s

name: Alien Jerky
description: A strip of alien meat that's been dehydrated, salted, and flavored with a mild teriyaki sauce.

name: Alien Kebab
description: Cubes of roasted alien meat, served skewered on a wooden stick, kebab style.

name: Alien Liquor
description: Distilled alcohol, formed by fermenting certain alien plants.

name: Alien Sandwich
description: A sandwich made from alien-sourced ingredients.

name: Alien Scramble
description: A breakfast dish made from alien eggs and diced vegetables.

name: Alien Tea
description: A strong tea made from a steeped alien plant.

name: Alien Tonic
description: Carbonated water flavored with an alien extract of unknown origin.

name: AMP
description: A steroid-based performance enhancer designed to temporarily boost leg strength.
effect: +35% Movement Speed for 2m 2x Jump Height for 2m

name: Analgesic Poultice
description: Combines the effects of antibiotics, heal paste, and bandages. Used for treating afflictions.
effect: Treats Burns, Contusions, Frostbite, Infections, Lacerations, and Puncture Wounds.

name: Anchored Immobilizers
description: A reinforced immobilizer, for particularly bad injuries. Used for treating afflictions.
effect: +150 Damage Resistance for 5m Treats Dislocated Limb, Fractured Limb, Fractured Skull, Sprain, and Torn Muscle.

name: Antibiotic Paste
description: Combines the effects of antibiotics and heal paste. Used for treating afflictions.

name: Antibiotics
description: Tried and true medicine, used to treat afflictions.

name: Antibiotic Cocktail
description: A mix of multiple antibiotics. Used for treating afflictions.

name: Baguette
description: A classic loaf of French bread.

name: Bandages
description: Wrapping for cuts and wounds. Used for treating afflictions.
effect: Treats Contusions, Lacerations, and Puncture Wounds.

name: Battlestim
description: A chem designed to improve pain

name: Beertini
description: A mixture of beer and vodka. Definitely an acquired test.
effect: +60 Damage Resistance for 3m +4 Carry Capacity for 5m -15% 02 Recovery for 3m

name: Bitten Sandwich
description: A salami and cheese sandwich. Clearly delicious, as evidenced by the large bite taken out of it.

name: Blend
description: A carbonated alcoholic beverage blended with caffeine and a potent secret ingredient.
effect: Slows time by 16% for 10s +60 Damage Resistance for 3m -20% 02 Recovery for 3m

name: Boba Alien Tea
description: Tea made from steeped alien leaves, with synthetic tapioca pearls.
effect: Restores 2 Health +8 02 for 5m +1% XP Gain for 15m

description: Black licorice-flavored Boom Pop! soda.

description: Orange-flavored Boom Pop! soda.

description: An improved injector. Used for treating afflictions.

name: Boudicca
description: Grants increased resistance to damage and fortifies oxygen.

name: Bourbon
description: A strong bourbon whiskey, supposedly brewed using techniques from a place called "Kentucky" on Old Earth.

name: Butter
description: Bostaurus Laboratories' finest butter, unsalted.

name: Carrot

name: Chandra Sauvignon Blanc

description: Erdebrau's lager, brewed with imitation wheat cultures and simulated hops.

description: Erdebrau's light beer, brewed with imitation wheat cultures and simulated hopes. Half of the calories of Erdebrau Ale.

description: Erdenbrau's pilsner beer, brewed with imitation wheat cultures and simulated hops.

description: Dill pickles rolled in beer batter and fried.

description: A classic grilled cheese sandwich.

name: Heart +
description: Improves fortitude and pain tolerance.

name: Immobilizer

description: Description
